actions.text: Amendment SA 292 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 292 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 51. Record Vote Number: 64.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 292.
Amendment SA 292 proposed by Senator Rubio. (consideration: CR S2281-2282; text: CR S2281) To express the sense of the Senate to enact Child Interstate Abortion Notification Act.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 292 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 51. Record Vote Number: 64.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 292 proposed by Senator Rubio.

purpose: To express the sense of the Senate to enact Child Interstate Abortion Notification Act.
